Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: If you're interested in trying to express or process (now or some time in the future) art therapy has been such a great tool for me. It's not at all about being artistic or the objective 'quality' of the art (thank goodness, cuz I'm not remotely artistic)...rather, it's about accessing a different and non-verbal form of expression and emotional processing. I've even used it to try to explain to therapists how I feel, when words fail me.
